verbs.description: Thousands of Indian women [V: have] put their careers on hold for a chance at the American dream . Trump wants to revoke a policy that ’s allowed them to work .
[ARG0: Thousands of Indian women] have [V: put] [ARG1: their careers] [ARG2: on hold] [ARGM-PRP: for a chance at the American dream] . Trump wants to revoke a policy that ’s allowed them to work .
